EntitySets.Name: Curricula
EntitySets.Description: Collection of curriculum entities for administrative operations

Properties.Name: status
Properties.Description: Status of the curriculum (Active, Inactive, Draft)

Properties.Name: createdDate
Properties.Description: Date when the curriculum was created

Properties.Name: lastModifiedDate
Properties.Description: Date when the curriculum was last modified

Properties.Name: displayOrder
Properties.Description: Order that users progress through the learning items within a curriculum

Properties.Name: globalDisplayOrder
Properties.Description: Order that this learning object is displayed in, globally, in the curriculum
